Class AbstractObservable

java.lang.Object
juno.model.util.AbstractObservable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractConfigurationFilesFactory, AbstractPlayer, ActualColorManager, AgeSetter, AvatarImageSetter, AvatarNameSetter, CardController, CardDispenser, CardEffectController, CardTimer, CircleConnector, Connector, FullScreenSetter, GameInitializer, GameStarter, GSetterAction, LastNameSetter, NameSetter, OneCardController, OneCardDispenser, PassTurnAction, PenaltyTimer, ProfileNameSetter, ProfilesRefresher, RegistrationGoal, StopAction, Stopper, WinConditionController, WinnerManager
public abstract class AbstractObservable extends Object implements Observable
This class implements the Observable interface by defining methods to encourage code reuse.
